name: Zombie Frenzy (itch) (denn-acrymoore)
description:
Zombie Frenzy is a final project for 2021's 3D Game Design and Develoopment class in Multimedia Nusantara University (UMN). 

The zombie apocalypse has started! You are the last survivor! Survive the onslaught of three unique zombies in three unique levels. Kill enough zombies to proceed to the next level or die trying.

Control: 

  • WASD                                     : Move character.
  • R                                                 : Reload.
  • Left Mouse Button          : Fire gun.
  • Mouse                                     : Move camera and aim. 

Team Members:
